extensionDescription.message: A beta webextension version of FireTitle which isn't fully functionnal.

OG_currentWindow.description: Option group name for current window's settings

OG_existingWindows.description: Option group name for existing window's settings

OG_defaultWindows.description: Option group name for default window's settings

OG_separator.description: Option group name for separator settings

O_windowName.description: Label of the window's name input

O_titlePattern.description: Label of the title's pattern input

O_preview.description: Label of the preview for window's titles

O_useCurrentPattern.description: Label for checkbox to use current window's pattern as default pattern

B_saveChanges.description: Button label for saving the changes made in the settings

B_applyPatternToExisting.message: Apply default pattern to opened windows
B_applyPatternToExisting.description: Button label for applying default pattern to existing windows

B_moreinfo.description: Link label for help and more info page

W_APIWarning.message: Due to Webextension limited API, the page title and the browser's name cannot be hidden from the titlebar. If you want this behavior to change, please support

W_APIWarningURL.description: Warning about limited API: link text
